patterns: What should I do if my wife files a false dowry and domestic violence case against me and my family?
my wife filed a false dowry and domestic violence case against me and my family
responses: As you are the accused in Dowry Harassment case, there is no other way but to contest it. It is a state case, and the complainant i.e. your wife is merely a witness. You can also check, whether there is any possibility of discharge or quash as they both happen on legal grounds.
In Domestic Violence case, you are a respondent. The case won’t finish off unless either the court decides it or you enter into a settlement with your wife.

All in all, you would need to fight any cases filed against you. You can also avail Alternate Dispute Resolutions like mediation/ Lok Adalat etc. The courts are very liberal to refer matters to mediation if parties so desire.
